actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for additional compensation for any veteran who as suffered the service-connected loss or loss of use of one lung or one kidney.

summary.text: Includes the service-connected loss or loss of use of a kidney or lung among the conditions for which war veterans may receive additional monthly disability compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for additional compensation for any veteran who as suffered the service-connected loss or loss of use of one lung or one kidney.
